newsitem.title: USA: EOTT Energy Partners Q4, year net higher.
newsitem.headline: EOTT Energy Partners Q4, year net higher.

text.p: EOTT Energy Partners LP said Thursday it 1996 net income from continuing operations was $28.8 million, or $1.50 per unit, up from $5.7 million, or $0.33 per unit, in 1995.
Fourth quarter net income from continuing operations was $7.3 million, or $0.38 per unit, up from $1.5 million, or $0.09 per unit, a year earlier, it said.

EOTT said its 1995 net loss was $61.4 million, or $3.54 per unit, including a charge of $54.4 million, or $3.13 per unit, taken in the 1995 second quarter related to the anticipated disposition of its West Coast processing and asphalt marketing operations, which were disposed of September 29, 1995, and have been reclassified as discontinued operations.

EOTT said its 1995 fourth quarter net loss was $2.3 million, or $0.13 per unit, including a charge of $3.8 million, or $0.22 per unit, associated with the final liquidation of the West Coast processing inventories.
